original_title: James Brown Live All The Way From Atlanta
overview: Live set by the Godfather of Soul from Chastain Park, Atlanta 1980.  Tracklisting includes: 'It's A Man's, Man's, Man's World', 'Get Up Offa That Thing', 'I Got You (I Feel Good)', 'Get On The Good Foot' and 'Papa's Got A Brand New Bag'.
title: James Brown Live All The Way From Atlanta
